about.title: Discover the Expertise of Trainer Jihad Shojaeha
about.mainDescription: Jihad Shojaeha is a trainer and consulting expert with extensive international experience, delivering thousands of training hours across Palestine, Arab countries, and Europe, including: Jordan, Lebanon, Tunisia, Iraq, Sudan, Netherlands, and Germany

stats.partnerships: Partnerships with 50 local and international organizations
stats.awards: Recipient of 5 local and international awards

about.collaborations: Jihad has collaborated with prestigious global institutions such as: Education For Employment (EFE), JICA, GIZ, World Bank, and Swedish Development Agency, in addition to prominent local community institutions
about.recentFocus: In recent years, he has focused on supporting ambitious trainers through effective strategies to secure contracts with local and international institutions and master the paid training market
about.conclusion: Whether you're a trainer starting your journey or a professional looking to expand... Jihad Shojaeha is your true partner for confidently moving towards success

vision.title: My Vision
vision.content: Empowering trainers to transform their expertise into a sustainable income source through paid training and consulting services

mission.title: My Mission
mission.content: Providing high-quality training and consulting programs that help trainers succeed in the paid training market and build their professional careers

expertise.title: Areas of Expertise
items: Training of Trainers (TOT) & American Board Certification
Individual Consulting and Coaching for Trainers
Development of Training Programs for Organizations

achievements.title: Key Achievements
items: Worked in 8+ Arab and European countries
Built partnerships with prestigious international institutions

approach.title: My Working Approach
items: Focus on practical results and application
Custom solutions for each trainee and organization
Using latest training methods and tools

cards.title: Training of Trainers (TOT)
content: American Board certified course available via Zoom or recorded sessions.
Professional introduction to training from needs analysis to practical projects.
Includes creative facilitation, e-training, and international certification with practical application.

cards.title: Individual Consulting & Guidance
content: 8-stage individual program over 4 months guiding trainers step by step.
Covers field selection, personal branding, identity building, and networking.
Professional technical and financial proposal preparation for training contracts.

cards.title: Corporate Training Programs
content: Tailored programs for team development including 21st century skills.
Skills like critical thinking, leadership, collaboration, emotional intelligence, and career planning.
In-house trainer development for managing interactive and impactful sessions.

headerSection1.subtitle: Training & Consulting Expert
headerSection1.descriptionPart1: I help you transform your skills and expertise into a
headerSection1.descriptionPart2: through paid training and consulting services

footer.ctaLine1: Are you ready to start your journey?
footer.ctaLine2: Enter the world of paid training and training contracts.

experience.title: Extensive Experience
experience.description: Trainer and consultant with over 20 years of experience in Palestine, Arab countries, and Europe, delivering over 15,000 training hours and benefiting more than 10,000 trainees.

international.title: International Collaboration
international.description: Worked with global institutions like EFE, JICA, GIZ, World Bank, and Swedish Development Agency, alongside hundreds of local and community institutions.

focus.title: Modern Focus
focus.description: Supporting ambitious trainers to break into the paid training market and secure contracts with local and international institutions using practical tools and strategies.

headerSection3.title: My Training and Consulting Services
headerSection3.subtitle: Comprehensive training and consulting solutions tailored to your needs

tot.title: Trainer of Trainers (TOT) Programs
items: Live Zoom courses with American Board certification
Recorded course available anytime at your convenience

consulting.title: Consulting and Individual Coaching
items: Professional guidance to enter the world of paid training

corporate.title: Customized Programs for Organizations
items: Career planning and job market readiness

gallery.title: From Training to Achievement
gallery.description: Photos capturing moments from my trainings and milestones along the journey.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.intro: We're waiting for your messages and suggestions. Share your thoughts or book a session for collaboration and training.

termsPage.title: Terms & Privacy Policy
termsPage.description: We appreciate your trust. Please read the following terms and policies carefully to understand how you can use our website and services.
termsPage.lastUpdated: This page was last updated on: {{date}}.

sections.title: Terms of Use
content: Please read these terms carefully before using this website.
By accessing or using the site, you agree to be fully bound by these terms.
If you do not agree to any of these terms, please stop using the site immediately.

sections.title: Privacy Policy
content: We respect your privacy. No personal information is collected without your explicit consent.
Browsing the website does not require personal data entry unless subscribing to specific services.

sections.title: Intellectual Property
content: All content (texts, images, designs, logos, videos, etc.) is owned by Coach Jehad Shojaeha and his team.
Reusing, modifying, or distributing any content without official written permission is prohibited.

sections.title: Legal Use of the Website
content: It is prohibited to use the site for any illegal purposes or to infringe rights or spread harmful content.
list: Incitement to violence, hatred, or discrimination.

sections.title: Trademarks
content: All marks and logos associated with the site are exclusive trademarks.
Any use without permission is a legal violation.

sections.title: Use of Free and Paid Products
content: Products available on the site (courses, files, etc.) are for personal use only.
list: Selling, republishing, or modifying is prohibited.
Commercial use without written approval is not allowed.

sections.title: No Warranties
content: The website and services are provided as-is without any express or implied warranties.
We do not guarantee accuracy, continuity, or error-free performance.

sections.title: Limitation of Liability
content: The website is not responsible for any direct or indirect damages resulting from your use or inability to use it.
